name: Catacombs of the Sacred Slug
description:
Tales speak of a Slug. A Sacred Slug. A Sacred Slug who slimed his way through slippery towns searching for sumptuous gold to be stolen and sold. He liked gold so much he made a statue of himself made out of the stuff! Once the Sacred Slug passed, he was sealed in a crypt with all his treasure, but now adventurers want it back... Time to slime in the Catacombs of the Sacred Slug!

In Catacombs of the Sacred Slug you play as the ghost of the Sacred Slug and must defend your treasure from 5 waves of mortal adventurers by taking control of objects such as chests to prevent them from reaching the end of the dungeon where your dearest treasure is held.

Created for University of Plymouth Game Jam - GAD Course.


Other Game Jam Entries:

https://hodgeasaurus.itch.io/union-street-brawl

https://fontaiiiiine.itch.io/calcium-cannon

---

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Mouse = Camera Movement

E = Control Object

Q = Exit Object

LMB = Attack as Object
